long_description: The blurr Cable Jacket looks tough but has a softer side. Rugged design and cozy fleece interior pack a double dose of style and comfort when you're facing a full day of work or play. Organic cotton/polyester fabric blend is soft and breathable; fleece interior adds lightweight warmth. Tall collar with hidden toggle closure; hand pockets, 1 with additional zippered compartment. Closeout.
short_description: The blurr Cable Jacket looks tough but has a softer side. Rugged design and cozy fleece interior pack a double dose of style and comfort when you're facing a full day of work or play.
